text: @ProjectLincoln @nurseroslynrn We also never had coronavirus ever. If someone else  in the WH beside Pres.Trump. Not only would people be dying. The government wouldn’t have rise our unemployment and giving us a stimulus package. Stop all mortgage, rent, etc..so we won’t be put out on the st. Think about that!
